game

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Each Square has an assigned multiplier and can have a Tile placed on it. The Board is comprised of 15x15 Squares.
    Author:
    Rajit Banerjee, 18202817, Tee Chee Guan, 18202044, Katarina Cvetkovic, 18347921 Team 15: DarkMode

      • isValid

        public static boolean isValid(int column,
                              int row)
        Checks if a specified square index is within the board.
        Parameters:
        column - integer between 0 - 14 to specify the real board column index
        row - integer between 0 - 14 to specify the real board row index
        Returns:
        true if the specified square index is valid

        Places a tile in a square
        Parameters:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Gets the String representation of a Square. If no Tile is placed on a Square, the Square multiplier is displayed, else the Tile letter is displayed.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String representation of a Square
